column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Hazelnut brioche: So rich and chocolate-y; as a serious chocolate lover
column2: this hit the spot. The chocolate is so incredibly creamy and is what I imagine love tastes like. There are these little balls of unidentified crunchiness (maybe rice crispies?) that provided a nice contrast to the smoothness of the chocolate. However
column3: the brioche tasted a little bit dry.
